title: Patient Testing | Responding to COVID-19 | UT Southwestern Medical Center
description: In response to the needs of our community, UT Southwestern has expanded our capabilities for COVID-19 testing for patients.
cleaned_text: video, please find step-by step instructions for the collection of a COVID-19 nasal self-swab specimen. A UT Southwestern staff member will come out to your vehicle at one of our drive-up testing sites with a PCR nasal swab collection kit. You will perform the nasal swab yourself while inside your vehicle. After completion, please return the collection tube to the test administrator.
